name: Jack Of All Blades
description:
You don’t just use your gear—you turn it into an extension of your will.

For each engagement die provided by equipment you’re wearing or wielding, you add one more die of the same type to your pool of engagement dice.

Describe how your expert handling of gear gives you a decisive edge in combat.

improvements.name: Master of Arms
improvements.description: Add two extra dice of the same type instead of one.
